changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE "companies"( "id" SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, "ifu" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE, "name" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, "address" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, "phone" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, "email" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE "users" ( "id" SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, "keycloak_user_id" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, "email" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, "role" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, "company_id" INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY ("company_id") REFERENCES "companies" ("id") );
